<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>St. John Bosco Parish - Tondo</title>
    <link rel="icon" href="path/to/church-logo.png" type="image/png">
    <meta name="description" content="Welcome to St. John Bosco Parish - Tondo.">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.5.0/css/all.min.css">
    <style>

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        body {
            margin: 0;
            font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
            background: #DFF6FF;
            color: #000;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        a {
            text-decoration: none;
        }

        /* HEADER */
        header {
            background: #024950;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 20px 40px;
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }

        nav ul li.dropdown:hover .dropdown-menu {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
            pointer-events: auto;
        }

        nav ul li.dropdown a i {
            margin-left: 5px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }

        nav ul li.dropdown:hover a i {
            transform: rotate(180deg);
        }

        /* Mobile responsive navigation */
        @media(max-width: 992px){
        #nav-menu { display:none; flex-direction:column; background:#024950; position:fixed; top:0; right:0; height:100%; width:250px; padding:50px 20px; z-index:1002; overflow-y:auto; transition: transform 0.3s ease; transform:translateX(100%);}
        #nav-menu.active { transform:translateX(0);}
        #hamburger { display:block; }
        nav ul li { margin-left:0; margin-bottom:10px; }
        nav ul li a { font-size:16px; }
        }

        .logo img {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            margin-right: 15px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 2px solid #fff;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }

        .logo img:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }

        .logo p {
            margin: 0;
            line-height: 1.2;
            font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
        }

        .logo h1 {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            font-size: 28px;
            font-weight: 900;
            margin: 0;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg,#FFD700,#ffffff,#FFD700);
            background-size: 400%;
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            animation: glowingText 6s linear infinite;
            transition: opacity 0.5s;
        }

        @keyframes glowingText {
            0% { background-position: 0%; }
            50% { background-position: 100%; }
            100% { background-position: 0%; }
        }

        nav ul {
            display: flex;
            list-style: none;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            margin-right: 50px;
        }

        nav ul li {
            margin-left: 20px;
            position: relative;
        }

        nav ul li a {
            color: #fff;
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            font-weight: 700;
            transition: color 0.3s;
        }

        nav ul li a:hover {
            color: #FFD700;
        }

        .login-icon {
            width: 32px;
            height: 32px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: transform 0.3s, filter 0.3s;
        }

        .login-icon:hover {
            transform: scale(1.2);
            filter: brightness(1.2);
        }
        /* Dropdown Menu */
        .dropdown-menu {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            pointer-events: none;
            position: absolute;
            top: 100%;
            left: 0;
            background: #024950;
            min-width: 140px;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
            z-index: 1001;
            border-radius: 6px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        /* Show Dropdown */
        .login-dropdown:hover .dropdown-menu {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
            pointer-events: auto;
        }

        /* Dropdown Links */
        .dropdown-menu li a {
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 15px;
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: background 0.3s, color 0.3s;
        }

        .dropdown-menu li a:hover {
            background: #036666;
            color: #FFD700;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }

        /* HERO */
        .hero {
            position: relative;
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .hero {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #FFD700, #024950); /* gradient as fallback */
        }

        .hero-video {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
            z-index: 0;
        }

        .hero-overlay {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            inset: 0;
            background: rgba(2, 73, 80, 0.2); /* reduced opacity */
            /* or use gradient */
            /* background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(2,73,80,0.4) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.2) 100%); */
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            color: #FFD700;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px #FFD700, 0 0 20px #FFD700, 0 0 30px #FFD700;
        }

        .hero-content h2 {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            font-size: 60px;
            font-weight: 900;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            color: #FFD580; /* Softer, warmer yellow */
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            white-space: nowrap;
            border-right: 4px solid #FFD580; /* Typing cursor */
            box-sizing: border-box;
            text-transform: uppercase;
        }

        /* Typing animation */
        @keyframes typing {
            0% { width: 0 }
            100% { width: 100% }
        }

        @keyframes blink-caret {
            0%, 100% { border-color: transparent; }
            50% { border-color: #FFD580; }
        }

        /* Apply typing animation */
        .hero-content h2.typing {
            width: 0;
            animation: typing 4s steps(40, end) forwards, blink-caret 0.75s step-end infinite;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
        }

        /* Hero paragraph */
        .hero-content p {
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: 500;
            color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
            text-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
            max-width: 600px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        /* SECTIONS */

        section {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(40px) scale(0.98);
            transition: opacity 0.9s ease, transform 0.9s ease;
            will-change: opacity, transform;
        }

        /* When visible */
        section.in-view {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
        }

        section .container {
        padding: 40px 20px;
        }


        /* Parallax subtle depth */
        .parallax {
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .parallax::after {
            content: "";
            position: absolute;
            top: -30%;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 160%;
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center;
            z-index: -1;
            transform: translateY(0);
            transition: transform 0.3s linear;
        }


        section:nth-child(odd) {
            background: #E5E5E5;
        }

        section:nth-child(even) {
            background: #fff;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        h2 {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            color: #024950;
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        p {
            font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
        }

        .button {
            background: #036666;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            border-radius: 5px;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: 0.3s;
        }

        .button:hover {
            background: #024950;
        }

        .service-shortcuts {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: nowrap;
            overflow-x: auto;
            gap: 20px;
            padding: 20px;
            justify-content: flex-start;
        }

        .service-shortcuts .card {
            flex: 0 0 auto;
            min-width: 220px;
        }

        .service-shortcuts .card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px);
        box-shadow: 0 8px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
        }

        .service-shortcuts .card h3 {
        font-size: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        color: #024950;
        }

        .service-shortcuts .card p {
        font-size: 16px;
        color: #024950;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .service-shortcuts .button {
        display: inline-block;
        background-color: #036666;
        color: #fff;
        font-weight: bold;
        padding: 10px 20px;
        border-radius: 6px;
        transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.2s;
        }

        .service-shortcuts .button:hover {
        background-color: #024950;
        transform: scale(1.05);
        }

        .urgent {
            background: red;
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: bold;
            padding: 10px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .map iframe {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border: 0;
        }

        /* FOOTER */
        footer {
            background: #024950;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px;
            position: relative;
        }

        .footer-content {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .footer-logo-container {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .footer-logo {
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 3px solid #FFD700;
            animation: glowingLogo 3s linear infinite;
        }

        /* GLOWING ANIMATIONS */
        @keyframes glowingText {
            0% { background-position: 0%; }
            50% { background-position: 100%; }
            100% { background-position: 0%; }
        }

        @keyframes glowingLogo {
            0%, 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 5px #FFD700, 0 0 10px #FFD700; }
            50% { box-shadow: 0 0 20px #FFD700, 0 0 40px #FFD700; }
        }

        .footer-section {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 200px;
            margin: 10px;
        }

        .social-icons {
            margin-top: 10px;
        }

        .social-icons a {
            margin-right: 10px;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 22px;
        }

        .black-footer {
            background: #000;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 10px;
            font-size: 14px;
        }

        /* FEEDBACK & BACK TO TOP */
        .feedback, .back-to-top {
            position: fixed;
            right: 20px;
            background: #036666;
            color: #fff;
            border-radius: 5px;
            padding: 10px;
            font-weight: bold;
            z-index: 1000;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }

        .back-to-top {
            bottom: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: none;
        }

        .feedback {
            bottom: 70px;
            display: none;
        }

        .feedback-form-container {
            position: fixed;
            right: 20px;
            bottom: 120px;
            background: #fff;
            color: #000;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 15px;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
            display: none;
            z-index: 1000;
            width: 280px;
        }

        .feedback-form-container h3 {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .stars-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .stars {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 5px 0;
        }

        .stars i {
            font-size: 24px;
            margin: 0 3px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: color 0.3s;
        }

        .stars i:hover, .stars i.active, .stars i:hover ~ i {
            color: #FFD700;
        }

        .star-desc {
            font-size: 14px;
            margin-top: 3px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        @media(max-width:768px) {
            .logo h1 { font-size: 20px; }
            nav ul { flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-end; }
            nav ul li { margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; }
            .footer-content { flex-direction: column; }
            .grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
        }

        @media(max-width:480px) {
            .logo h1 { font-size: 16px; }
            header { padding: 10px; }
            section { padding: 40px 10px; }
        }

        header.shrink {
            padding: 8px 25px;
        }

        header.shrink .logo img {
            width: 35px;
            height: 35px;
        }

        header.shrink .logo h1 {
            font-size: 20px;
        }

        header.shrink .logo p {
            font-size: 10px;
        }

        .daily-verse-section, .inspiration-section {
        padding: 40px 20px;
        background-color: #fff;
        }

        .daily-verse-card {
        background-color: #ffffff;
        padding: 20px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
        text-align: center;
        margin: 0 auto 20px auto;
        border: 2px solid #c9a300;
        }

        .daily-verse-card h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        margin-bottom: 12px;
        color: #024950;
        }

        .daily-verse-card p {
        font-size: 18px;
        color: #024950;
        line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow:0 12px 35px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
        }

        .button:hover {
            box-shadow:0 0 25px #007BFF, 0 0 50px #007BFF, 0 0 75px #007BFF;
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }

        .image-collage div:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05) rotate(2deg);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        }

        #featured-event {
            padding: 50px 0;
        }

        .events-row {
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 20px;
            flex-wrap: nowrap;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .event-card {
            width: 23%;
            background: white;
            border-radius: 10px;

            padding-bottom: 15px;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;

        }

        .event-card img {
            width: 100%;

        }

        .event-card h3 {
            padding: 10px;

        }

        .event-card p {
            padding: 0 10px;
            font-size: 14px;
        }

        .event-card:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 80, 160, 0.5);
        }


            #mass-offering {
            padding: 60px 0;
            background-image: url('your-background-image.jpg');
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
        }

        .offering-container {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85);
            padding: 40px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin: auto;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 0 18px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .offering-container:hover {
            transform: scale(1.03);
            box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(50, 100, 180, 0.7);
        }

        .offering-content h2 {
            font-size: 32px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            color: #004080;
        }

        #about {
            padding: 70px 0;
            background: linear-gradient(to right, #e3f2ff, #ffffff);
        }

        .about-wrapper {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 35px;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: auto;
        }

        .about-text {
            flex: 1;
            background: white;
            padding: 40px;
            border-radius: 18px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 80, 160, 0.2);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .about-text:hover {
            transform: scale(1.03);
            box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(0, 70, 150, 0.5);
        }

        .about-text h2 {
            font-size: 34px;
            color: #003d7a;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .about-text p {
            font-size: 17px;
            color: #333;
        }

        .about-images {
            flex: 1;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .about-images img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 260px;
            object-fit: cover;
            border-radius: 15px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .about-images img:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            box-shadow: 0 0 18px rgba(0, 50, 120, 0.5);
        }

        #services {
            padding: 70px 0;
            background: #eef7ff;
        }

        .services-title {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 34px;
            color: #003d7a;
            margin-bottom: 35px;
        }

        .service-shortcuts {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 25px;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: auto;
        }

        .service-card {
            background: white;
            padding: 30px;
            border-radius: 18px;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 0 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .service-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px);
            box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(0,70,150,0.4);
        }

        .service-card h3 {
            font-size: 22px;
            color: #003d7a;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        .service-card p {
            font-size: 15px;
            color: #333;
            margin-bottom: 18px;
        }

        .service-btn {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 10px 18px;
            background: #0073d0;
            color: white;
            border-radius: 10px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: background 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .service-btn:hover {
            background: #0059a3;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0,60,120,0.6);
        }
            </style>
            </head>

        <!-- HEADER -->
    <header>

        <!-- User Icon -->
        <div class="dropdown login-dropdown" style="position:relative;">
        <img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/9131/9131478.png" alt="User Icon" class="login-icon" style="width:35px; height:35px; cursor:pointer;">

            img.style.boxShadow = '0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)';

        images[current].style.boxShadow = '0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)';
        current = (current + 1) % images.length;
    }, 2500);

    <!-- ABOUT PARISH -->
    <section id="about">
        <div class="about-wrapper">
            <div class="about-text card">
                <h2>About the Parish</h2>
                <p>St. John Bosco Parish Tondo started in 1967 with the first Salesian mission in the area, followed by the Don Bosco Youth Center in 1968, and its canonical erection as a parish in 1969. The Salesians formed the mission to address the educational and spiritual needs of the youth in Tondo. Through the years, the parish supported young people through academic training, vocational instruction, and faith formation programs that focused on their growth and development.</p>
            </div>

        <!-- FEEDBACK & BACK TO TOP -->
        <a class="feedback">RATE OUR SERVICE</a>
        <a href="#home" class="back-to-top">↑</a>

        <div class="feedback-form-container" id="feedback-form">
            <h3>Rate Our Service</h3>
            <div class="stars-container">
                <div class="stars" id="stars">
                    <i class="fas fa-star"></i>
                    <i class="fas fa-star"></i>
                    <i class="fas fa-star"></i>
                    <i class="fas fa-star"></i>
                    <i class="fas fa-star"></i>
                </div>
                <div class="star-desc" id="star-desc">Select a star</div>
            </div>
            <input type="text" placeholder="Additional Feedback">
            <button>Submit</button>
        </div>

        <script>
            const feedbackBtn = document.querySelector('.feedback');
            const feedbackForm = document.getElementById('feedback-form');
            const backBtn = document.querySelector('.back-to-top');
            const parishName = document.getElementById('parish-name');
            const stars = document.querySelectorAll('#stars i');

            let originalName = 'St. John Bosco Parish - Tondo';
            let shortName = 'DON BOSCO - TONDO';
            let transitioning = false;

            stars.forEach((star, i) => {
                star.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    stars.forEach(s => s.classList.remove('active'));
                    for (let j = 0; j <= i; j++) stars[j].classList.add('active');
                    document.getElementById('star-desc').textContent = "You rated: " + (i + 1);
                });
            });

            window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
                backBtn.style.display = (window.pageYOffset > 300) ? 'block' : 'none';
                feedbackBtn.style.display = ((window.innerHeight + window.scrollY) >= document.body.offsetHeight - 50) ? 'block' : 'none';
                feedbackForm.style.display = 'none';

                let midpoint = document.body.scrollHeight / 2;
                let newName = (window.scrollY > midpoint) ? shortName : originalName;

                if(parishName.textContent !== newName && !transitioning) {
                    transitioning = true;
                    parishName.style.opacity = 0;
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        parishName.textContent = newName;
                        parishName.style.opacity = 1;
                        transitioning = false;
                    }, 500);
                }
            });

            feedbackBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                feedbackForm.style.display = feedbackForm.style.display === 'block' ? 'none' : 'block';
            });

            backBtn.addEventListener('click', e => {
                e.preventDefault();
                window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
            });

            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('section');
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if(entry.isIntersecting) entry.target.classList.add('in-view');
                });
            }, { threshold: 0.1 });
            sections.forEach(section => observer.observe(section));
        </script>

        <script>
        window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
            const header = document.querySelector("header");
            if (window.scrollY > 10) {
                header.classList.add("shrink");
            } else {
                header.classList.remove("shrink");
            }
            });
        </script>

        <script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        const sections = document.querySelectorAll("section");

        const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
            entries => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        entry.target.classList.add("in-view");
                    }
                });
            },
            {
                threshold: 0.2
            }
        );

        sections.forEach(sec => observer.observe(sec));

            /* Parallax effect */
                window.addEventListener("scroll", () => {
                    document.querySelectorAll(".parallax").forEach(sec => {
                        let speed = 0.25;
                        let offset = window.pageYOffset * speed;
                        sec.style.backgroundPositionY = offset + "px";
                    });
                });
            });
            </script>

            <script>
            // DAILY VERSE (random from API)
            fetch("https://labs.bible.org/api/?passage=random&type=json")
            .then(response => response.json())
            .then(data => {
                const verse = data[0].text + " " + data[0].bookname + " " + data[0].chapter + ":" + data[0].verse;
                document.getElementById("daily-verse").innerText = verse;
            });

            // INSPIRATIONAL MESSAGE ROTATOR
            const inspirations = [
            "Do not be afraid. Trust in God always. – Archdiocese of Manila",
            "Let your light shine before others. – Pope Francis",
            "Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. – Archdiocese of Manila",
            "Pray without ceasing and live in faith. – Pope Francis",
            "Love one another as I have loved you. – Archdiocese of Manila"
            ];

            const today = new Date();
            const index = today.getDate() % inspirations.length;
            document.getElementById("inspiration-msg").innerText = inspirations[index];
            </script>

        const hamburger = document.getElementById('hamburger');
